long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Faces" is an internal online Bronto employee directory.  If you don't work for Bronto, this extension is not for you (it won't work).

This extension serves two purposes:

1.  To add subordinates info to managers' faces pages.  

Similar to "What's the Boss Chain?", this extension injects a table near the bottom of a manager's page which lists pictures, names, and titles of all employees who report to that manager.

(Infrequent faces users should ignore #2)

2.  To provide an advanced faces search tool within the url bar.  

As a new employee, I use faces all the time and wanted some way that I could perform real-time searches by firstname &/or lastname &/or job title without loading faces.bronto.com.  This extension achieves that goal and also allows instant access to a LinkedIn or Twitter page by typing "t" or "L" (not case sensitive) in the url bar after selecting an entry from the drop-down suggestions.


See screenshots for more details.

Please email me to my Bronto address if you have any suggestions or feedback!
